items.preText: sawan: "whats the most aggregated score by a batsman in a 3 match series?" -- 360 by Babar Azam against West Indies
items.text: length ball, skips down the track and lofts it over deep midwicket for a 71-meter six
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, a half-pull, half-sweep towards deep square leg
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, driven past the diving cover fielder
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Susam: "Please tell exactly how many innings take for Soumaya to get this fifty. I know his last one against Ireland." -- Eight innings, Susam
items.text: length ball, just outside off, defended towards cover-point
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short of length around off, tucked away towards square leg for a single
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.preText: Ever-watchful Mohammad Isam just pinged me this: Imrul Kayes now has the most runs in a three-match ODI series for Bangladesh, crossing Tamim Iqbal's 312 v Pakistan in 2015.
items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, dabbed behind the square leg
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: short of length outside off, slapped towards extra cover who fumbles it and gives an easy single
items.shortText: Ngarava to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg and tickled down the fine leg for a boundary
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: a tad fuller this time, around middle and leg, and clipped towards square leg
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Adnan mahmud: "These two batsmen are literally muscling the game away from Zimbabwe. ZIM need a wicket here desparately. Otherwise we will end up watching a one-sided power game by BD"
items.text: fuller on pads, flicked away towards backward square leg for a single
items.postText: This is already the second-best second-wicket stand for Bangladesh in ODIs
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: comes down the track and launches it into the orbit over long-on, a huge hit by Soumya
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: and again! Almost an action replay of the last ball, skips down again and hits him over long-on, 81 meters, this is finishing soon, folks!
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: fuller on stumps, driven back towards the bowler
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller, just outside off, Soumya plays it gently towards short midwicket
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: clips it towards square leg for a single and keeps the strike
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: The highest second-wicket stand for Bangladesh in ODIs is 207 by Tamim and Shakib against West Indies in July this year. Soumya and Imrul have added 187
items.text: bouncer, down the leg side and Soumya helps it on its way, beats the man at fine leg
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: back of length, around middle and off, defended on the off side
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Another gem from Isam: This is Bangladesh's second highest score after 25 overs in an ODI. The previous was 176-3 v Zim in 2009.
items.text: back of length, angling away, Soumya opens the face to run it down towards short third man for a quick single
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Mahmud: "@kayes please make 127, and you will be the highest scorer in a 3 match serie. pls don't waste the opportunity man. " -- Mahmud has got the calculations done
items.text: short of length down the leg side, a nudge to fine leg
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: it's raining fours and sixes here, it was a slower one and Soumya skipped down, went through with his shot and got a one-bounce four at midwicket
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: another bouncer, pulls it away towards deep square leg, moves to 99
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball, on the pads, plays it towards square leg and gets to his second ODI hundred, off just 81 balls, nine fours and four sixes in that knock
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller on stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball, goes back and tucks it away towards backward square leg
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Jamal: "At the rate Soumya is scoring, I don't think Kayes will get 127!!"
items.text: length ball, Soumya pushes at it, gets a thick outside edge past short third man who chases it tow keep it to two
items.shortText: WP Masakadza to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs
